name: Kombi RedHEAT Active Long Bottoms - Men's
description: Being cold is just as bad as overheating. These base layer bottoms are made with temperature regulating fabric that disperses body heat to keep you comfortable during strenuous activity.Maetrx RedHEAT fibres manage body heat during high-output activities.Anti-odour finish resists stink on long backcountry tours or multi-day backpacking adventures.Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection.Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear.
